attributes.action: Take ALL measures necessary to secure the return of our service personnel kidnapped by Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition demands that the Prime Minister take any measure necessary including military action (if required) against Iran to secure our Sailors and Marines safe return.
Further this petition demands punitive military action upon Iran if our personnel are harmed or mistreated in any way - including being charged with any crimes by the Iranians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
